QuestData.Title: Finish Me!
QuestData.Description: They taunt us - even as they lie dying here...$b$bPlease, $g brother:miss;... Don't allow their mocking to be the last sounds I hear...$b$bFinish me... deliver me from this torment... into... the Light.$b$bSeek out my companions... offer them the same mercy.$b$bLeave nothing for the Scourge to raise!$b$bI beg you...
QuestData.LogDescription: A Dying Soldier in the Broken Front wants you to kill 5 Dying Soldiers and report to High Captain Justin Bartlett on the Skybreaker.
QuestData.RewardText: That was a difficult thing you did, $c. But it was the right thing.$b$bDon't allow the memory of your actions to haunt you. Harness that sorrow and pain you feel! Direct it at those who caused it.$b$bThe Horde must pay!
